## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                              | Type                                | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `name`   | `name`    | Specifies the name to be shown.          | `string`                            | `undefined` |
| `shape`  | `shape`   |                                          | `"round" \| "square"`               | `'round'`   |
| `size`   | `size`    |                                          | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl" \| "xs"` | `'m'`       |
| `src`    | `src`     | Specifies the `src` to an image to load. | `string`                            | `undefined` |
